body_html:
Try replacing the inputs from a tf.constant to a tf.Variable. the static graph is probably being optimized away via constant folding, and the dynamic one is not. if your input is not a tf.constant but a placeholder or Variable, then both the static and dynamic graphs will have to execute all operations at each session.run.
…

body:
Try replacing the inputs from a tf.constant to a tf.Variable.  the static
graph is probably being optimized away via constant folding, and the
dynamic one is not.  if your input is not a tf.constant but a placeholder
or Variable, then both the static and dynamic graphs will have to execute
all operations at each session.run.
